Repetitive strain injuries

For systems that require that involve extensive repetitive actions for input, people may need alternate input devices or approaches.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
Fine motor controlMotionAlternative

  • Reference: Avoid repeated inputs (button-mashing/quick time events)
  • Reference: Provide a macro system
